directions: Place cream cheese, goat cheese, Parmesan, basil, roasted garlic, and salt and pepper into a food processor; pulse until smooth and well blended. Spoon filling into a cookie press or pastry bag (a plastic baggie with the corner cut out will also work), and fill olives.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) jars jumbo or extra large olives
title: Cheese Stuffed Olives
